text: Measures component lead-time availability factored against operational goals, with alerts for EOL, lead-time push outs, and allocations events.
Measures component lead-time availability factored against operational goals, with alerts for EOL, lead-time push outs, and allocations events.
Measures the variance between BOM provided price vs best available price using public sources or variance to your internal part pool pricing.
Measures the ability of product data to support rigorous examination of import/export compliance requirements, including USA (UL), Canadian (CSA), European (TUV), Japan (CB), ROHS.
Measures how a component is sourced (single, sole, or multiple sources), proximity to manufacturing locations (hubbing), and history of supplier performance.
